statements: SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence;
SELECT medication_name, prescribed_dosage FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, adherence_score FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE prescribed_dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescribed_dosage, actual_dosage, adherence_score FROM MedicationAdherence ORDER BY adherence_score DESC;
SELECT medication_name, SUM(actual_dosage) AS total_actual_dosage FROM MedicationAdherence GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT medication_name, adherence_score FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE prescribed_dosage > actual_dosage;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescribed_dosage, actual_dosage, adherence_score FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE adherence_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY adherence_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE actual_dosage = 0;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(actual_dosage) AS total_actual_dosage FROM MedicationAdherence GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_actual_dosage > 100;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients WHERE medication_dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM adherence_data WHERE adherence_level = 3 ORDER BY adherence_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, medication_schedule FROM patients WHERE medication_name ILIKE 'aspirin%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, adherence_date, adherence_level, adherence_reason FROM adherence_data WHERE adherence_level > 1 AND adherence_reason ILIKE '%forgot%' ORDER BY adherence_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' ORDER BY medication_dosage DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, medication_dosage FROM patients WHERE medication_schedule > NOW() AND medication_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY medication_schedule ASC;
SELECT adherence_date, adherence_level, adherence_reason FROM adherence_data JOIN patients ON adherence_data.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE adherence_level < 5 ORDER BY adherence_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, medication_dosage, medication_schedule, adherence_level, adherence_reason FROM patients JOIN adherence_data ON patients.patient_id = adherence_data.patient_id ORDER BY medication_name, adherence_level ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(adherence_level) AS avg_adherence FROM adherence_data GROUP BY adherence_date HAVING AVG(adherence_level) > 7;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, medication_id FROM Patients
SELECT medication_name FROM Medications WHERE medication_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, adherence_level FROM Patients WHERE adherence_level > 3
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, adherence_level FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.medication_id = Medications.medication_id
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.medication_id = Medications.medication_id
SELECT patient_name, adherence_level, date FROM Patients JOIN AdherenceRecords ON Patients.patient_id = AdherenceRecords.patient_id ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage, adherence_level FROM Medications JOIN Patients ON Medications.medication_id = Patients.medication_id WHERE adherence_level > 80
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) as total_patients, MAX(adherence_level) as max_adherence FROM AdherenceRecords
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, adherence_level FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.medication_id = Medications.medication_id WHERE adherence_level < 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, medication_history FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage BETWEEN 10.0 AND 20.0;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Adherence ORDER BY date_adhered DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, side_effects FROM Medications WHERE dosage >= 50.0 ORDER BY medication_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Adherence.date_adhered, Adherence.adherence_percentage FROM Patients JOIN Adherence ON Patients.patient_id = Adherence.patient_id WHERE Adherence.adherence_percentage < 90.0 ORDER BY Adherence.adherence_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Adherence.adherence_id, Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, Adherence.date_adhered FROM Adherence JOIN Patients ON Adherence.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Adherence.medication_id = Medications.medication_id ORDER BY Adherence.date_adhered DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, predicted_compliance, prediction_date FROM Patients JOIN Compliance_Predictions ON Patients.patient_id = Compliance_Predictions.patient_id WHERE Compliance_Predictions.predicted_compliance < 0.7 ORDER BY predicted_compliance ASC, prediction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT med_name, dosage, instructions FROM medications ORDER BY med_name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, adherence_status FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id JOIN adherence_logs ON prescriptions.prescription_id = adherence_logs.prescription_id;
SELECT patient_name, compliance_probability, predicted_date FROM patients JOIN compliance_predictions ON patients.patient_id = compliance_predictions.patient_id WHERE compliance_probability > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, insurance_id FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT med_name, dosage FROM medications ORDER BY med_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT patient_name, med_name, start_date, adherence_status FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN adherence_logs al ON pr.prescription_id = al.prescription_id WHERE al.adherence_status = 'Missed';
SELECT patient_name, age, compliance_probability FROM patients p INNER JOIN compliance_predictions cp ON p.patient_id = cp.patient_id WHERE compliance_probability < 0.6 ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 5;
